H0.text: Which veteran Hollywood actor played Judge Henry Garth in the TV western series 'The Virginian'. Charles Bickford

H1.text: Which veteran Hollywood actor played Judge Henry Garth in the TV western series 'The Virginian'. Ward Bond

H2.text: Which veteran Hollywood actor played Judge Henry Garth in the TV western series 'The Virginian'. Raymond Burr

H3.text: Which veteran Hollywood actor played Judge Henry Garth in the TV western series 'The Virginian'. Lee Cobb

A4.text: Ward Bond did not play Judge Henry Garth in 'The Virginian'; he played Judge Robert Garvey in 'Tall in the Saddle' and other roles, but there is no mention of him being in 'The Virginian'.

A5.text: Lee J. Cobb played Judge Garth in 'The Virginian'.

A6.text: Charles Bickford played John Grainger, not Judge Garth, in 'The Virginian'.
